Replace Normal Mode Maps With Ultimate Mode Maps (GFX Only) [Ralf]
2030A6B8 2C000003
0430A6BC 48000010

Replace Ultimate Mode Maps With Normal Mode Maps (GFX Only) [Ralf]
2030A6B8 2C000003
0430A6BC 4800002C
E2000001 80008000


Character Model Modifier [Ralf]
2028E444 7C7F1B78
0428E448 386000xx
0428E44C 4800006C
E2000001 80008000

xx = Model ID


Model IDs

00 - HUmar
01 - HUnewearl
02 - HUcast
03 - RAmar
04 - RAcast
05 - RAcaseal
06 - FOmarl
07 - FOnewm
08 - FOnewearl
09 - HUcaseal
0A - FOmar
0B - RAmarl
0C - Elly   (Base model must be a Hunter with hair/head type 1)
0D - Flowen (Base model must be a Hunter or Ranger with hair/head type 1)
0E - Tails
0F - Knuckles
10 - Sonic
11 - Rico   (Base model must be a Hunter or Ranger with hair/head type 1)
12 - Ninja  (Base model must be a Hunter with hair/head type 1)

0428E44C 4800006C
E2000001 80008000

0428E44C 4800006C
E2000001 80008000

0428E44C 4800006C
E2000001 80008000
